entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:36 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
